summary: Comprehensive testing of CleverBox CMS - drag and drop school website builder. Tested both backend APIs and frontend UI components. Backend working well with minor auth issue. Frontend core functionality working with some navigation issues.

authentication_issues.issue: Login endpoint accepts any credentials and returns 200 instead of 401 for invalid credentials
authentication_issues.impact: Security concern - no validation of credentials in demo mode

ui_bugs.issue: Preview page not loading properly - timeout waiting for preview-page selector

navigation_issues.issue: Back to dashboard button not found in editor

modal_issues.issue: Modal overlays blocking button interactions - had to use force=true for clicks

passed_tests: Widgets sidebar with search and category filtering
success_percentage: Backend: 95.2% (20/21 tests), Frontend: 80% (major flows working with minor issues)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issues causing button click interceptions. Verify preview page loading and editor back button functionality. Consider adding proper auth validation if not intentional demo behavior.
